Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Kimball. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Kimball.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
